meanings.definition: Behavior that is cowardly or treacherous.
meanings.sent1: The dastardliness of the villain was evident in his sneaky actions.
meanings.sent2: His dastardliness was revealed when he abandoned his friends in need.
meanings.sent3: The dastardliness of the cat stealing the dog's bed was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The dastardliness of the storm stealing the sunshine was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The dastardliness of the thief was unforgettable to the townspeople.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being despicable or contemptible.
meanings.sent1: The dastardliness of his behavior left a stain on his reputation.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the dastardliness of the betrayal by her closest friend.
meanings.sent3: The dastardliness of the squirrel stealing the bird's food was quite surprising.
meanings.sent4: The dastardliness of the lie spread through the town like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The dastardliness of the crime scene made the detective's job even harder.
